channel.title: Crypto News - SosoValue Research

item.title: Ethereum spot ETFs saw a net inflow of $2.18B last week, setting a new weekly net inflow record.According to SoSoValue data, last week's trading days (Eastern Time, July 14 to July 18), Ethereum spot ETFs saw a net inflow of $2.18B last week, setting a new record for single-week net inflows. The Ethereum spot ETF with the largest net inflow last week was Blackrock's ETF ETHA, with a weekly net inflow of $1.76B. Currently, ETHA's total historical net inflow has reached $8.06B. [Wu Blockchain]

item.title: OpenAI Founder: Over 1 Million GPUs to be Deployed Before Year-EndOpenAI founder Sam Altman tweeted, "We will deploy over 1 million GPUs by the end of this year. I am very proud of the team, but now they better figure out how to increase that number by 100x." [Foresight News]

item.title: Minsheng Securities: Stablecoins are expected to help traditional financial assets conduct "on-chain" transactionsMinsheng Securities pointed out that, in the short term, cross-border payment scenarios are expected to become an important application scenario for stablecoin adoption. Stablecoins are expected to help improve the efficiency of cross-border payments and reduce cross-border payment costs. Financial technology companies related to cross-border payments are expected to continue to benefit. It is recommended to focus on LianLian DigiTech. In the long term, stablecoins are expected to promote virtual asset trading and RWA, STO. Stablecoins are expected to help traditional financial assets conduct "on-chain" transactions. (Jiemian News) [Odaily]

item.title: Analyst: Current bull market cycle led by institutions, whether it will benefit altcoins remains uncertainPresto Research analyst Min Jung said that supported by sustained institutional demand (especially from cryptocurrency fund management companies), Bitcoin continues to hover near its all-time high, and the price of ETH has also benefited from the push of institutional investors. More and more listed companies are starting to include ETH in their corporate treasuries, and the market is showing early signs of an altcoin season, but it is uncertain whether this strong momentum will extend to the broader altcoin market. (The Block) [Odaily News]

item.title: Bank of America Merrill Lynch: Stablecoins will have a disruptive impact on traditional bank deposits and payment systems.According to Wall Street Insights, Bank of America Merrill Lynch's latest research report shows that as the U.S. regulatory framework for stablecoins gradually takes shape, stablecoins will have a disruptive impact on traditional bank deposits and payment systems within the next 2-3 years. The U.S. President has signed the GENIUS Act, setting a preliminary framework for stablecoin regulation. In the short term, the stablecoin market is expected to grow by $250-750 billion, which will boost demand for U.S. short-term Treasury bonds. [Foresight News]

item.title: BitMart officially launches its Chinese name "币市" (Bì Shì), accelerating its global localization strategy.BitMart has announced the official launch of its new Chinese brand name, "币市" (Bì Shì), and has simultaneously introduced a new brand mascot. Since its establishment in 2017, BitMart has provided services to over ten million users in nearly 200 countries and regions worldwide. The platform now offers over 1,700 spot trading pairs and more than 400 perpetual contracts. In conjunction with the brand upgrade, 币市 (BitMart) will soon launch a series of activities and exclusive services for Chinese users, and will continue to increase investment in the Asia-Pacific region. [Odaily News]

item.title: Sui ecosystem launches BTCFi series of events, participate to win rich rewardsOn July 21, the Sui ecosystem launched a BTCFi series of activities where users holding any BTC-backed assets can earn rewards by completing tasks, including: SatLayer platform xBTC event: From July 9 to October 1, 2025, deposit xBTC on SatLayer to earn satXBTC and earn more rewards; Bluefin tBTC Galxe event: From July 9 to July 23, 2025, complete tasks to win a $5,000.00 prize pool; OKX Wallet Cryptopedia event (Season 36): From June 26 to August 24, 2025, participate in the event to learn how Sui native DeFi works, and complete some simple tasks to get rewards; xBTC Phase 1: From June 24 to August 27, 2025, deposit xBTC, USDC, or SUI on the NAVI or Momentum platform to receive specific event rewards; Lombard Luminary Program: Users can stake BTC on the Lombard platform to earn LBTC and earn rewards; wBTC: Bridge wBTC to Sui via Sui Bridge and participate in Sui DeFi to earn income. [Techflow]

item.title: "Rich Dad Poor Dad" Author: Bubbles Always Burst, Will Continue to Buy if BTC Falls"Rich Dad Poor Dad" author Robert Kiyosaki posted on the X platform, saying: Bubbles always burst, and when they do, gold, silver, and Bitcoin may also fall. However, if the prices of gold, silver, and Bitcoin plummet, he will continue to buy, but reminds investors to be cautious. [Odaily星球日报]

item.title: Binance to Remove Seed Tags From BONK, EIGEN, ETHFI, PENGU, and PEPE on July 21Binance has announced that it will remove the seed tags from Bonk (BONK), EigenLayer (EIGEN), ether fi (ETHFI), Pudgy Penguins (PENGU), and Pepe (PEPE) on July 21, 2025. Seed tags are typically used to identify emerging innovative projects with higher volatility and risk. [Wu Blockchain]

item.title: Hong Kong stocks of stablecoin concept stocks are strengthening, with China Inspection & Certification Healthcare rising more than 30%.Hong Kong stock stablecoin concept stocks collectively strengthened, with China Inspection Medical surging over 30%, Linklogis Technology rising over 8%, Victory Securities up 7.1%, OSL Group up 1.43%, Bright Smart Securities up 5.60%, and Alibaba also rising. Regarding news, U.S. President Trump recently formally signed the "Guidance and Establishment of National Innovation Act for Stablecoins in the United States" (GENIUS Act) at the White House, marking the entry of U.S. stablecoin regulatory legislation into the implementation phase. In addition, Hong Kong's "Stablecoin Ordinance" was officially published in the Gazette on May 30 and will take effect on August 1. From an ecological chain perspective, the stablecoin ecosystem can be specifically divided into three levels: primary market issuance, secondary market circulation, and application scenarios. In terms of individual stocks, China Inspection Medical has initiated the application for a U.S. stablecoin license and is actively promoting the Web3 exchange ecosystem; Yunfeng Financial recently announced on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange that it will strategically focus on areas such as Web 3, Real World Assets (RWA), digital currencies, ESG zero-carbon assets, and artificial intelligence. [Sina Finance] [Odaily News]
